amendment.description: Amendment in the nature of a substitute sought to propose a constitutional amendment providing that, not inconsistent with the first article of amendment to the Constitution, the Congress shall have power to prohibit the physical desecration of the flag of the United States.
amendment.purpose: An amendment in the nature of a substitute made in order under H. Res. 255. "Not inconsistent with the first article of amendment to this Constitution, the Congress shall have power to prohibit the physical desecration of the flag of the United States.".

action.text: Amendment (A001) in the nature of a substitute offered by Mr. Watt.
The previous question was ordered on the amendment (A001) and the joint resolution without objection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Watt amendment (A001) Failed by the Yeas and Nays: 129 - 296 (Roll no. 233).
